docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: LIZ SILVERSTEIN, a 28-year-old New Yorker, keeps up with restaurants the way some people keep up with movies or plays or music. She knows, for instance, that everyone is going to Il Bianco, and that M.K. is a must-see. ''I figure I can sit home when I'm 90,'' she said. ''I want to go out now.''

headline.main: Signs of Satiation In New York's Appetite For Chic Restaurants
